comments:
Build ID: I20070608-1718

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create JPA project                                                    
2.Add java class with some fields, in the project                       
3.Open JPA development perspective
4.In the JPA Structure tree view, select some of the fields                 
5.In JPA Details view, for "Map As" select "Id"                             
6.In JPA Details view, section Primary Key Generation, change value of "Strategy"    
Result: NPE Error.                                                          
Note: The strategy list should be disabled, if Primary Key Generation       
checkbox is not checke

More information:

Created an attachment (id=72631)
The patch set strategy combo disable, if PK is not set

The patch fixes the reported buf, as well as the additional one:
1. If the user want to set the generator name quickly, the generator value object is null and NPE was thrown:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jpt.ui.internal.mappings.details.GeneratedValueComposite$4.modifyText(GeneratedValueComposite.java:160)

Created an attachment (id=76942)
proposed patch without disabling combo box

The change in createGeneratedValue() to store the generatedValue is all that is needed to fix this bug.  No reason to disable the combo box, this allows the user to set the strategy wthout the extra step of clicking the 'Primary Key Generation' check box.  

I also fixed a minor issue with depopulating the strategy combo box if the @GeneratedValue annotation is removed.
patch checked in to maintenance and head
